project.name: Password Generator
project.description: Modern, secure web application for generating customizable passwords

1.title: Implement Password Strength Indicator
1.description: Add visual password strength indicator to provide real-time feedback on password quality
1.details: Create a password strength indicator component that analyzes generated passwords and displays strength levels (weak, medium, strong, very strong) with visual color coding and explanatory text.
1.testStrategy: Test with various password combinations, verify accuracy of strength assessment, ensure responsive design

2.title: Enhance Accessibility Features
2.description: Improve accessibility compliance to WCAG 2.1 AA standards
2.details: Implement proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, focus management, and color contrast improvements. Ensure all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard and assistive technologies.
2.testStrategy: Test with screen readers, keyboard-only navigation, color contrast analyzers, and accessibility audit tools

3.title: Performance Optimizations
3.description: Optimize application performance for faster loading and interactions
3.details: Implement code splitting, lazy loading, bundle optimization, and caching strategies. Ensure page load times under 2 seconds and interaction responses under 100ms.
3.testStrategy: Performance testing with Lighthouse, WebPageTest, and Core Web Vitals monitoring

4.title: Session-based Password History
4.description: Add ability to view and manage recently generated passwords within the session
4.details: Implement a session-based password history feature that stores recently generated passwords in memory (not persisted). Include options to regenerate, copy, and clear history.
4.testStrategy: Test session storage, memory management, history limits, and clear functionality

5.title: Batch Password Generation
5.description: Enable generation of multiple passwords at once
5.details: Add functionality to generate multiple passwords simultaneously with the same or varying criteria. Include options for quantity selection and bulk copy/export.
5.testStrategy: Test performance with large batches, memory usage, and UI responsiveness

6.title: Export Functionality
6.description: Add ability to export passwords in various formats
6.details: Implement export functionality for generated passwords in CSV, JSON, and plain text formats. Include options for secure export with encryption.
6.testStrategy: Test file generation, format validation, download functionality, and data integrity

7.title: Custom Character Set Configuration
7.description: Allow users to define custom character sets for password generation
7.details: Create interface for users to define custom character sets, save/load character set presets, and use custom sets in password generation.
7.testStrategy: Test custom set validation, preset management, and edge cases with special characters

8.title: Password Templates System
8.description: Implement predefined password templates for common requirements
8.details: Create a system of password templates for common scenarios (WiFi passwords, PIN codes, alphanumeric codes, etc.) with preset configurations.
8.testStrategy: Test template functionality, validation, and user experience with preset selection

9.title: Enhanced Security Implementation
9.description: Implement advanced security features and cryptographic improvements
9.details: Upgrade to Web Crypto API for secure random number generation, implement secure memory handling, add entropy analysis, and security audit compliance.
9.testStrategy: Security testing, entropy analysis, cryptographic validation, and penetration testing

10.title: Automated Testing Suite
10.description: Implement comprehensive testing coverage for all features
10.details: Set up unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, and security tests. Include CI/CD integration for automated testing on every commit.
10.testStrategy: Test coverage analysis, CI/CD pipeline validation, and test reliability assessment
